This course will cover data manipulation, visualisation and analysis using R. It will be tailor made to the needs of participants. Learn about t-tests, linear or logistic regression, or other methods relevant to your research.

**What's included for your \$500 registration fee:**

-   online workshop with multiple attendees (1-2 hours)

-   two one-on-one meetings with an experienced statistical consultant

Please email [Russell](russell@theanalyticaledge.com) to register.
